QuestData.Title: Jaded Heart
QuestData.Description: The more powerful remnants of that horrible manifestation may be too much for you to handle on your own, $n.$b$bI fear I'd be of little help in terms of actual combat, but I can suggest a solution.$b$bThe great jade statue was soon to become a living serpent - one of our revered celestials. Its construction imbued it with special powers that may sufficiently weaken these adversaries.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Celestial Jade Chunks to defeat 6 Sha Remnants.
QuestData.RewardText: <Cho looks at you despondently.>$b$bThis jade was meant for... so much more.
